name: TB Repeater Meta Box
author: vishitshah

sections.description: Unlock the power of custom metadata within WordPress with our plugin. Seamlessly integrate repeater functionality, enabling users to add text, editor, and image options in a flexible and intuitive interface. Whether crafting intricate page layouts or fine-tuning post details, our plugin empowers users to create dynamic content with ease. Say goodbye to limitations and hello to endless possibilities with our custom repeater plugin.
